page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PAT.
page.content: Get up at 7.30. Get kids up. Makes breakfast and sandwiches.Then I shout at kids to hurry up. Eat my breakfast. Get kids off to school. Wash up, clean cooker and kitchen. Talk to my mum on phone. Wake husband at 10.30a.m. and get dressed. Make cup of tea or coffee. Drink it and go to work at chippy. Serve fish and chips till 1.30 Clean up. Home at 1.45. Have a cup of tea or coffee with husband. See him off to work. Get out vacuum cleaner. Vacuum, dust, polish, tidy living- room, bathroom, kitchen and hall way. Sometimes do the washing. Make tea for kids and me at 5.30-6.00. Have tea. watch T.V. till 6.45ish. Make tea for husband. Have quick cuppa. Go to work at chippy. Serve till 11.00. Clean up. 11.30 home. Have a bath and wash hair. Clean bathroom again. Dry hair and watch T.V.to relax. BED.
